import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import "./product.css"; import { Publish } from "@material-ui/icons"; export default function Product() { var serie = "true"; const location = useLocation(); const movie = location.movie; console.log(movie.isSeries); if (movie.isSeries === true) { serie = "no"; } return (

Movie

{movie.title}
id: {movie._id}
genre: {movie.genre}
year: {movie.year}
limit: {movie.limit}
); }
